Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), mpi-default-dev, dh-sequence-fortran, libmpich-dev [alpha amd64 arm64 armel armhf hppa hurd-amd64 hurd-i386 i386 loong64 m68k mips mips64el mipsel powerpc ppc64 ppc64el riscv64 s390x sh4 sparc64 x32], cmake (>= 3.3.1), openssh-client
Package-List: libcaf-mpich-3t64 deb libs optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-amd64,hurd-i386,i386,loong64,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libcaf-openmpi-3t64 deb libs optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,hurd-amd64,loong64,mips64el,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sparc64 libcoarrays-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libcoarrays-mpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-amd64,hurd-i386,i386,loong64,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libcoarrays-openmpi-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,hurd-amd64,loong64,mips64el,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sparc64
